statements: SELECT * FROM genetic_testing_results LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_id, result, test_date FROM genetic_testing_results WHERE disease_id = 1;
SELECT result, test_date FROM genetic_testing_results WHERE patient_id = 100 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_testing_results WHERE result = 'Positive' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT disease_id, COUNT(*) AS result_count FROM genetic_testing_results GROUP BY disease_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 3;
SELECT * FROM genetic_testing_results WHERE result = 'positive';
SELECT patient_id, disease_id, result FROM genetic_testing_results WHERE test_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, disease_id, result FROM genetic_testing_results WHERE disease_id = 3 ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, test_date FROM genetic_testing_results WHERE result = 'negative' ORDER BY test_date ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM genetic_testing_results WHERE disease_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM hereditary_diseases;
SELECT patient_name, disease_type, test_result FROM hereditary_diseases;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, test_date FROM hereditary_diseases ORDER BY test_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM genetic_variants WHERE chromosome_number = 12;
SELECT gene_name, variant_type, allele_frequency FROM genetic_variants ORDER BY allele_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM hereditary_diseases WHERE disease_type = 'Cancer';
SELECT patient_name, test_result FROM hereditary_diseases WHERE test_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, disease_type FROM hereditary_diseases ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT gene_name, variant_type, allele_frequency FROM genetic_variants WHERE chromosome_number = 5 ORDER BY allele_frequency DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT disease_type FROM hereditary_diseases;
SELECT * FROM hereditary_diseases_results;
SELECT patient_id, disease_name, result_date FROM hereditary_diseases_results WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM hereditary_diseases_results WHERE disease_name = 'Cystic Fibrosis';
SELECT patient_id, disease_name, result_date FROM hereditary_diseases_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT disease_name, total_cases, average_age_diagnosis FROM disease_statistics WHERE total_cases > 1000;
SELECT * FROM hereditary_diseases_results ORDER BY result_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, disease_name FROM hereditary_diseases_results WHERE genetic_variation = 'ABC123';
SELECT first_name, last_name, COUNT(*) AS total_results FROM patient_information JOIN hereditary_diseases_results USING (patient_id) GROUP BY first_name, last_name;
SELECT disease_name, total_cases, prevalence_rate FROM disease_statistics WHERE average_age_diagnosis > 40;
SELECT patient_id, disease_name, result_date FROM hereditary_diseases_results WHERE disease_name LIKE 'C%' ORDER BY patient_id ASC, result_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM TestResults LIMIT 10;
SELECT patient_id, test_name FROM TestResults WHERE result = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result FROM TestResults WHERE test_name = 'COVID-19' ORDER BY patient_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients WHERE age > 60 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND contact_number IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM TestResults WHERE result = TRUE;
SELECT patient_id, test_name, result FROM TestResults ORDER BY test_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM Patients WHERE age > 30 AND gender = 'Male';
SELECT disease_name, description FROM Diseases ORDER BY disease_name ASC LIMIT 3;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Diseases.disease_name, PatientDiseases.diagnosis_date FROM Patients JOIN PatientDiseases ON Patients.patient_id = PatientDiseases.patient_id JOIN Diseases ON PatientDiseases.disease_id = Diseases.disease_id;
SELECT * FROM Patient;
SELECT patient_name, birth_date FROM Patient ORDER BY birth_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, blood_type FROM Patient WHERE blood_type = 'O';
SELECT Patient.patient_name, Disease.disease_name FROM PatientHistory JOIN Patient ON PatientHistory.patient_id = Patient.patient_id JOIN Disease ON PatientHistory.disease_id = Disease.disease_id;
SELECT Patient.patient_name, GeneticMutation.mutation_name FROM Patient JOIN GeneticMutation ON Patient.patient_id = GeneticMutation.mutation_id;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, birth_date, blood_type FROM Patient WHERE patient_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM TestResult ORDER BY test_date DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT patient_name, disease_name, diagnosis_date FROM PatientHistory JOIN Patient ON PatientHistory.patient_id = Patient.patient_id JOIN Disease ON PatientHistory.disease_id = Disease.disease_id WHERE Disease.disease_name LIKE '%flu%';
SELECT patient_name, test_type, result FROM TestResult JOIN Patient ON TestResult.patient_id = Patient.patient_id WHERE TestResult.result = 'positive';

SELECT patient_name, common_symptoms FROM PatientHistory JOIN Patient ON PatientHistory.patient_id = Patient.patient_id JOIN Disease ON PatientHistory.disease_id = Disease.disease_id WHERE Disease.common_symptoms LIKE '%fever%';
